divs: Sighting Detailsme and my freind were boating near peabody beach in middletown when my freind noticed something unusual in the sky towards the stern of the boat at first i thought it was a star but then i noticed that it was moving this didnt alarm me because there were c-130 transport planes flying nearby but i realized later that it was far too fast to be a c-130 and the way it suddenly changed directions like no other aircraft ive seen before told me it was something different than a plane or helicopter after about three minutes it went above clouds and dissapeared
trends: There has been one other sighting in Middletown
There were no other sightings in Middletown on or around July 27th 2010
